column6: CIVIL WAR TIE-IN!  While Cap has fallen into the conflict of the Civil War, in a clash with his government and his friends, the people close to him have suffered in their own ways. Take a look inside S.H.I.E.L.D., and how Cap's girlfriend Agent 13's life is torn apart as her divided loyalties are used against her by her superiors. Also, a new villain emerges, and the Red Skull begins to make himself known...
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | colorist:Frank D'Armata | penciller (cover):Steve Epting | letterer:Randy Gentile | penciller:Mike Perkins
